passive.name: Sweet Dreams
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer's Basic ATK or Skill does not result in a CRIT Hit, increases their CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). This effect can only trigger once every <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
